# Provide support for advanced LaTeX features
\usepackage{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[ngerman]{babel}

% Define which non-ASCII characters to replace
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{1F512}{[SECURITY]}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{1F680}{[LAUNCH]}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{1F4CA}{[STATS]}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{1F41B}{[BUG]}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{2728}{[FEATURE]}
\DeclareUnicodeCharacter{1F525}{[CRITICAL]}
